span.p: The 2U, 25-drive, 2.5" drive Disk Array Enclosures (DAEs) provide 12Gbs SAS connectivity to Back End IO Modules in the VMAX 250F engine. Two DAE’s in a V-Brick are directly connected to the engine.
DAEs include the following main components:

ul.li: A maximum of 25 drives per enclosure
Two redundant DAE power supplycooling modules (accessible from the rear)
Two link control cards (LCCs) (accessible from the rear)
